title: Deep Learning 201 - Course
summary: An Open Source Course on AI targeted for business professionals
keyPoints: Designed a course on NLP, Computer Vision, and Tabular ML, through collaborating with ML Engineers
Emphasized concepts such as Tensors, Embeddings, and Neural Networks as thresholds to understand AI
Taught Students ML workflow skills in EDA, data preprocessing a nd transformation, then training models

title: Brain Wave Project
keyPoints: Used pandas, sklearn & scipy to transform and interpret raw electrode signals as images to train ResNet models
Reduced loss by 29% and error rate by %15 over others through better signal-processing and transformation
Received a Kaggle silver medal through data storytelling in the jupyter notebook format
Rapidly researched and understood how to solve the problem that electrode data presents

title: Chinese Relational Flashcard Maker
keyPoints: Collecting and normalizing data to design a SQL Database
Using Design Driven Development to code a completely different approach to learning Chinese
Application will be served with a stack of FastAPI, SQL, and React
Will export high quality flashcards based on relationships between characters
